DOC.brief_title: GBR 12909 Study Cocaine Experienced African American Volunteers - 1
DOC.detailed_description: Double-blind , placebo-controlled , safety pharmacology study 75 mg dosage GBR 12909 cocaine experience African American Volunteers . Particular interest give hematological safety data .
DOC.criteria: Must within 20 % ideal body weight must weigh least 45 kg . Must understand study procedure provide write informed consent . Must meet DSM4 criterion abuse dependence cocaine . Must nontreatment seek time study . Please contact study site information .
